item.title: One year out from Election Day, Tuesday's results could shape 2026 midterms
item.description: ABC News is taking a look at the 2026 midterms, now just one year away.

item.title: Half of Americans say Trump admin not committed to protecting rights, freedoms: Poll
item.description: Most say Trump isn't committed to protecting freedom of the press, other rights.

item.title: Train derails in northwest England with no immediate reports of injuries
item.description: A train has derailed in northwest England, but authorities are reporting no injuries

item.title: WATCH: Obama: 'Country and our politics are in a pretty dark place right now'
item.description: Jersey's race for governor at a rally in Newark on Saturday, saying the "country and our politics are in a pretty dark place right now."

item.title: WATCH: Two girls thrown from Ferris wheel at Louisiana harvest festival
item.description: Both girls are under 13 years old and were transported to the hospital, with one of them being airlifted to the facilities.
